text: Ðis sanden þe landimaren at uppidele.
Of pidelen streame, on hlosstedes crundles suð ecge of þane crundle, on þat mere sled.
Of þat mere slede on ðeo herepaþe.
Of mearhhilde mere, on þane haþene berielese on midde þane punfald, of þanne punfalde, on pidelenstream.
Of pidelenstreme anlang burnstowe on gretenlinkes.
Suth ecge of þane gretenlinke, on chellenberghe,<../images/tbar.gif>eft on pidelen streame.
And se made be frome þat to þanne tune ibereth.
